nodes.bodyText: Have testHBaseLookupFunction, do we need expose this?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -45,6 +47,7 @@
  * The HBaseLookupFunction is a standard user-defined table function, it can be used in tableAPI
  * and also useful for temporal table join plan in SQL.
  */
+@Internal

nodes.bodyText: The testHBaseLookupFunction is a temporary solution when this test was introduced, because temporal join is not supported at that time. I will refactor the tests in the next pull request. So I think we don't need to expose this class.
